/* LoyCampaign.selectPromAc2SurDetail */ SELECT lpa.RID_SURV AS surveyRid , lsm.SURV_NO AS surveyNo , lsm.SURV_NM AS surveyNm , lpa.RID AS rid FROM LOY.LOY_PRUL_AC2SUR lpa JOIN LOY.LOY_SURV_MST lsm ON lpa.RID_SURV = lsm.RID AND lsm.FLAG = 1 WHERE lpa.FLAG = 1 AND lpa.RID_PROM = #{promRid}

/* LoyCampaign.selectPrulAc1CardInfo */ SELECT , lcg.TGT_GRP_NM AS chnlTgtGrpNm , lpa.RID AS rid FROM LOY_PRUL_AC1CARD lpa JOIN LOY.LOY_CHNL_GRP lcg ON lpa.RID_CHNL_GRP = lcg.RID AND lcg.FLAG = 1 WHERE lpa.FLAG = 1 AND lpa.RID_PROM = #{rid}

/* LoyCampaignMapper.selectCampaignContentsChnnelRel */ select ccr.RID as id , ccr.CREATE_BY as createBy , ccr.MODIFY_BY as modifyBy , ccr.CREATE_DATE as createDate , ccr.MODIFY_DATE as modifyDate , ccr.RID_PROM as campaignId , ccr.RID_CONTS as contentsId
, ccr.EXP_SEND_DATE as exeTm , ccr.EXP_TYPE as exeType from LOY.LOY_PROM_ALT_CHNL ccr left outer join com.mkt_conts_mst cm on ccr.RID_CONTS = cm.ID where 1=1 and ccr.RID = #{id} order by ccr.MODIFY_DATE desc OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT CASE WHEN lopd.DATA_VAL IS NOT NULL THEN lopd.DATA_VAL ELSE 'N' END useNotiYn FROM loy.LOY_OPR_PLCY lop JOIN loy.LOY_OPR_PLCY_DTL lopd ON lop.RID = lopd.RID_OPR AND lopd.FLAG =1 where 1=1 AND lop.FLAG =1 AND lop.USE_YN = 'Y' AND lop.CTG_2_CD ='C2' AND lop.PLCY_CD ='C13' AND rownum = 1
select count(*) AS promBuyYnCount FROM LOY.LOY_PROM lp LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_PGM lp2 ON lp.RID_PGM = lp2.RID AND lp2.FLAG = 1 WHERE lp.FLAG = 1 AND lp.PROM_TYPE_LV1_CD ='PUR' AND lp.NOTI_YN ='Y'
